column4: Description
Is the report itself, including historical versions as appropriate
The report represents a specific managed information view of the scrubbed financial market information
Is a detailed definition of the report contents, including properties that clarify the quality/integrity and timeliness of the content
Is the schedule for maintaining the report content

column3: Financial Market Information Report Access History
column4: Is a log/record of access made to the report by bank users
Refers to the content record provided by the external service provider in whatever form suitable

column3: Financial Market Information Service Report Properties
column4: Key properties of the report used in its improvement (e.g. date created, qualifications of integrity)

column4: Reference to any agreement covering access to the external service

column4: References to the different sources of financial market information used to improve the content (can be primary source and comparison data)
